name: unadmired
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If someone or something is unadmired, people do not think that they are attractive or pleasant, or that they deserve respect: The work of such a fine artist cannot be unnoticed or unadmired. He was a pathetic creature who died friendless and unadmired. Related word
admire
More examplesFewer examplesShe sat apart from her classmates, unadmired and unsought after.This once unadmired figure has now become an object of widespread public sympathy.He remained obscure and unadmired as an artist for the entire length of his life.
